dct_title_s: The Isle of CALIFORNIA, New MEXICO, LOUISIANE, The River MISISIPI (sic), and the Lake's of CANADA
dct_description_sm: California as an island with indented northern coast. Annian, Straits of Annian, and The North Straits to north.
LC 536, 553, 566; Wagner 487; Wheat 81 & 109; Tooley 78; Leighly 119 (Plate XVII); UCB.
Title cartouche of simple rectangle (upper left).

Issued in his: A System of geography: or, A new & accurate description of the earth in all its empires, kingdoms and states, [pt. 2, p. 152], London : for T. Childe, 1701. With title Northern AMERICA and the Arctick Countries, above map.
Issued in his: Atlas manuale: or, a new sett of maps of all the parts of the earth, as well Asia, Africa and America, as Europe ... [Map 36], London : for A. & J. Church, 1709.
Issued in his: The compleat geographer: or, The chorography and typography of all the known parts of the earth. To which is premis'd an ... 3rd ed., [p.] 230 / by Herman Moll, 1709.
Bound in his: Atlas manuale ..., [Map 36]. -- London : Printed for F. Churchil in Pater-Noster-Row; and T. Childe in St. Paulâ€™s Church-yard, MDCCXIII (1713).
Issued in his: The compleat geographer ..., 4th ed., [p.194], 1723.
